lines: 1. Mana kak` abet abiro,ok anyal bet maber kenda,Adwaro rembi moromayie iwara kuom ng`wononi.
Kaka abet, kaka abet abironi,O Ruoth winja, gwedha, wara ,kaka abet abironi.
2. Mana kak` abet ang`eyo,Rembi kende emoroma,Noluoka matar moloyokomiya genoi chutho.
3. Mana kak` abet abiro,chunya mool ogomboi,Ok anyal bet mabor kodi,Adwaro bet mari chutho.
4. Chunya gi ngimana duto,Mondo oyud yuweyo kuomi,K`ase bayo ma ase ol,Ayuweyo kuom hera mari.
